Title: Ace of Hearts: Bwana Y'umutima
Actors: Lysa Gasirabo, Ganza Prince, Isimbi Sonia, Polisi Muhirwa Yves
Plot: Manzi David, a man whose sister's days are numbered with heart disease. Heartbroken and determined as ever to rally money for her treatment, Manzi David sets himself on a path of no return ...
